title: Rank banner trims
body: Hey guys, just wondering, I'm in s4 and I still don't have a silver banner trims, why is that? D;

replies.body:
you only get banners for your LAST season rank

since you're silver now, you will get a silver banner NEXT season
At lest there are some Summoners here with a brain to not be toxic.
Why would you even want a silver trash banner? I'd sooner end my life than use a silver banner.
Because I just got silver from my provisional, and silver is a decent rank, I think

> [{quoted}](name=Hypnotits,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E6s8raiT,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-28T18:21:03.417+0000)
>
> Because I just got silver from my provisional, and silver is a decent rank, I think

it isn't the best rank 
but pretty alright for your first season, at least you're not bronze
